DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine minimal effective dose impact : 1. treatment outcomes 4 , 12 and/or 48 week treatment require treat patient experience first psychotic episode 2. final maintenance dos 3. use medication 4. amount change antipsychotic medication 5. number hospitalization day
DOC.brief_title: Dose Finding Quetiapine Fumarate 200mg v 400mg First Episode Psychosis
DOC.criteria: Patients experience first psychotic episode Male Female Aged 1525 Previous treatment antipsychotic medication ( longer 1 week ) History clinically significant physical illness Organic disorder present psychotic symptom
